song.englishname: Let the Words of My Mouth (Psalm 19:14, Phillipians 4:8)

english.segment1: Let the words of my mouth. Be pleasing to You, pleasing to You. The meditation of my heart. Be pleasing to you, pleasing to You. Oh Lord, my strength. And my Redeemer
english.segment2: Whatever is true. Whatever is pure. Whatever is lovely. Whatever is worthy. Think on these things. Think on these things
english.segment3: Let the words of my mouth. Be pleasing to You. Pleasing to You
